ygData.subject: Re: DR Question from Ryan
ygData.msgSnippet: Will this list ever stay on topic?  Its EQ Rangers, not DR Reunions. Its all warm and fuzzy, guys, but keep it off the list. FYI, here s the theme: A Mailing
ygData.messageBody:
Will this list ever stay on topic? Its EQ Rangers, not DR Reunions.

Its all warm and fuzzy, guys, but keep it off the list.

FYI, here's the theme:

A Mailing list dedicated to the discussion of the Ranger class in
Everquest.
Strategies, tips, RP opportunities and anything related to Rangers is
welcome.

And yes, I feel free to speak for the list here, because I am
quoting the charter. This is ridiculous.


Mikaela wrote:
>
> From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
>
> Natu,
>
> Hi, it's Aderes from Dragon Realms, in the new persona of Mikaela R'achai,
> level 46 cleric and Tiasha, level 11 druid, both on The Rathe.
>
> I finally closed my DR account, knowing I would not return after falling in
> love with EQ and meeting so many wonderful people here.
>
> If you ever get on the Rathe, give me a holler....
>
> Mik, formerly Aderes d'Thera, Warrior Mage of the Realms
>
